reviews.review: One-of-a-kind experience where every chapter is memorable. Hardly any frustrating parts yet filled with great physics puzzles. Players who originally played Garry's Mod may enjoy both the seriousness and the recognizable assets. I have completed three playthroughs -- First on the Orange Box (Xbox 360) and once on each of my Steam accounts. FOLLOW FREEMAN!
Entretenido y una joya de juego.

It's Half-Life 2 alright! And it's exactly as fine as you remembered it! Honestly, I don't know why, but this game always gives me the biggest headache whenever I play it for more than a few hours. Other Source Engine games don't make me feel like this, so I've come to the conclusion that the game wants me not to play it, and as such I will respect it's wishes and never play it again. Especially since it super drags to be honest. Also I do not care at all about any of the characters except Barney. Everything about Barney is just very funny to me. What's his deal. I dunno.
A really fun retro title that is perfectly smooth to play, atmospheric, and has aged excellently.
everything up until follow freeman and anti-citizen one was amazing in my opinion
I had just beaten it, when i beat the last chapter I did not know that was it. Very good game
It's a great game you should try it for sure if you are into puzzles.

Its a good game yes, its half life 2 after all but i liked the first 1 more because of the gameplay, the gameplay of half life 2 didnt excite me as much as the first one because it feels far less accurate and hitting the enemy depends on luck not on skill some times.Either way this is a fantastic game and you should play it

Now I finally know why this game is so popular. Good gameplay: really fun mechanics and diverse weapons (revolver and shotgun are really fun to use) with great map design, solid puzzle and quick movement which feels good. I have beaten this game in 12h. and like 85% of the game was great [beginning was good, center was amazing, part with abusing rocket launcher to destroy giant spiders was in my opinion annoying and mediocre (monotony) but last 30 minutes of the game were again really fun: gravity gun upgrade was a great decision, this mechanic is really good] So yeah, I recommend this game to everyone who likes FPS or just a solid  gameplay.
Number One single Player game of all time

Okay so I beat the game and it's so good. The end had to be my favorite I loved the "upgraded" gravity gun (no spoilers). The graphics still hold up today and I can't imagine how good they were considered at the time. Great story and environmental story telling. (I loved Lamar at the end of the credits) 11/10
